metadata.title: DPM Dar, Saudi FM reaffirm commitment to futther strengthen bilatral ties

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Apr 09 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister, Senator Ishaq Dar on Wednesday held a telephone conversation with Foreign Minister of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Prince Faisal Bin Farhan Al-Saud. The two leaders discussed issues of mutual interest and reaffirmed comittment to further strengthen existing fraternal ties between the two brotherly countries, a press release issued by the Foreign Office Spokesperson said.
